    public class AddEditFormJDialog
extends javax.swing.JDialog
    AddEditFormJDialog.java A class representing the GUI used in a maintaining a cities database. 
        Project: GolfersGUI Database
    Platform: jdk 1.6.0_14; NetBeans IDE 6.8; Mac OSx
    Course: CS 143
    Hours: 1 hour
    Created on May 12, 2013, 10:00:00 PM
